ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on the dark of the night
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:1.2_0: the nun Caṇḍakāḷī quarreled with the nuns and then cried after repeatedly beating herself.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:1.3_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:1.4_0: “How can Venerable Caṇḍakāḷī cry after repeatedly beating herself?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:1.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Caṇḍakāḷī did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:1.8_0: “... How can the nun Caṇḍakāḷī act like this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:1.9_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:1.10_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:1.11.1_0: ‘If a nun cries after repeatedly beating herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:2.1.7_0: If she cries after repeatedly beating herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:2.1.8_0: If she beats herself, but does not cry, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:2.1.9_0: If she cries, but does not beat herself, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:2.2.2_0: if she cries, but does not beat herself, because of loss of relatives, loss of property, or loss of health;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:2.2.5_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on tenth rule, is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc20:2.2.6_0: The second sub-chapter on darkness is finished.
